title: Calculating Month Difference in Python
description: In Python, you can calculate the difference between two dates using the datetime module. This challenge will test your ability to calculate the month difference between two dates.

meta.title: Python Date Difference | Datetime Module
meta.description: Learn how to calculate the month difference between two dates using the Python datetime module. Improve your programming skills with this coding challenge.
meta.keywords: python, datetime, date difference, programming challenge, coding tutorial
